content.title: Getting Started with SEAk
content.subtitle: Learn how to log in, create projects, and organize your analyses in SEAk.
description: The first step in using SEAk is logging in and navigating to the Project Section, which serves as the container for your analyses, datasets, and workspaces.
A Project is a container for your analyses, datasets, and workspaces. Projects allow you to organize work based on geography, disaster event, or theme.
After logging in, you arrive at the Project Section where you can select an existing project or create a new one.
Navigate to the Projects section and click the 'Add New Project' button.
In the form, enter the Project Name and Description.
Add relevant Tags by typing and pressing Enter after each tag.
Click 'New Project' to save, or 'Cancel' to discard.
Once created, click on the project card to access or manage its associated workspaces.
